summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality, configuration handling, and numerical behavior of the DPMSolverSinglestepScheduler across different prediction types, noise conditions, scheduling strategies, and precision modes.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the scheduler component used in diffusion models, facilitating reliable model deployment and supporting features such as custom timesteps, pretrained loading, and mixedâ€‘precision inference.
